author: jdcasey
msg: Applied Edwin's patch to create the resource-target directory if it doesn't exist. Thanks for the work, Edwin!
Also, I modified this patch slightly per Jerome's suggestion, to fail with a message if outputDir.mkdirs() doesn't succeed. This is fine, since it's within the scope of !outputDir.exists().

author: cutting
msg: Keep trying to restart job tracker.
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: cutting
msg: Don't rely on ssh SendEnv.  Instead folks can use
$HOME/.ssh/environment to pass environment variables to slaves.  Note
that sshd must be configured on slaves with PermitUserEnvironment
